body:
Hi Claudia,

[Ladybug Photovoltaics](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ladybug-photovoltaics-components-released) components are based on [NREL PVWatts](http://www.nrel.gov/docs/fy14osti/60272.pdf) model.
[Honeybee Photovoltaics](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1350615) components are based on [Energy plus](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/engineering-reference/page-111.html) model.

I am sure the author of Honeybee Photovoltaics will help you with your bug.
